column3: pavement-merged  # The COCO pavement-merged includes runways of airplanes. BDD are only street scenes and has no images of runways.
road  # The COCO road includes runways of airplanes.

fence-merged  # The COCO fence-merged includes iron guard rails next to the highway. In BDD there are images with concrete guard rails which are marked as background. Hence the COCO fence-merged class includes the BDD fence class.
